casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
David FELTON No. 54P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 16, 2017 David Felton, for Felton, David. Mary Carla Babb, Assistant Attorney General, Robert A. Evans, Jr., District Attorney, for State of North Carolina *292ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 13th of February 2017 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of March 2017."

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th of February 2017 by Defendant to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of March 2017."

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th of February 2017 by Defendant to Appoint Counsel:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of March 2017."
